factText: Florence, the 6th named storm of the 2018 Atlantic hurricane season, is west of the Cabo Verde Islands. ..TROPICAL STORM FLORENCE FORMS JUST WEST OF THE CABO VERDE ISLANDS.. NHC has upgraded Tropical Depression Six to Tropical Storm Florence, the sixth named storm of the 2018 Atlantic hurricane season. Tropical Update: Tropical Storm Florence is now the 6th named storm of the 2018 Atlantic hurricane season (Graphic 1).
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-004_general_What news outlets are reporting on {event} and what are they saying?

factText: NHC is issuing advisories on recently upgraded Tropical Storm Florence, located about a couple of hundred miles west of the Cabo Verde Islands - www.nhc.noaa.gov/#Florence  Elsewhere, a tropical wave . NHC is issuing advisories on Tropical Storm Florence, located a couple of hundred miles west of the Cabo Verde Islands - www.nhc.noaa.gov/#Florence:=:https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/ Elsewhere, the cloudines

factText: The Coconut Groove Band Concert Scheduled for Saturday, September 15th at the Meadowmont Gazebo/Playground has been Cancelled Due to the forecasted inclement weather from Hurricane Florence this weeke. CANCELLED: Due to impending weather conditions from Hurricane Florence, Movie Night scheduled for Saturday, September 15 (as well as the September 16 rain date) has been cancelled.
Tropical Update Tropical storm Florence is centered 310 miles west of the Cape Verde Islands with 45 mph sustained winds.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-004_Hurricane_What is the maximum sustained wind speed recorded for {event}?

factText: BATON ROUGE (September 1, 2018) – The Governor’s Office of Homeland Security and Emergency Preparedness (GOHSEP) has activated its Crisis Action Team as the state monitors two potentially dangerous we. Tropical Storm Florence RPOEM Advisory #1 The Rochelle Park Office of Emergency Management along with the National Hurricane Center in Miami FL is monitoring Tropical Storm Florence.
